page.title: 02HEALTH BRAE
page.content: The {Brae Health Centre}is a modern building fully equipped and very comfortable. The two Doctors are there every weekday.They are on call at weekends.Three Nurses help them in their work. Next to the doctors the Dentist has a room. He is there every weekday and sees people from all over Shetland.Two assistants aid him in his duties. Two recptionists direct you to the many people who work in the centre.Apart from the Doctors and Dentist there are Health visitors,Social workers,Chiropodist and Physiotherapist. The health of the whole community is taken care of from the smallest baby visiting the Health visitor to the old lady seeing the Chiropodist.
